line.comment: * because "random value between X and Y -1"
* Build Trading Station if needed, even if $maxStations is reached.
* check the number of shipyards per each race
* We can build a shipyard if we have enough money.
* We go in the loop even if we don't have enough money, in order to update core security levels.
* We don't rebuild shipyards if the player has a fleet in the sector.

sval.val: because "random value between X and Y -1"
Build Trading Station if needed, even if $maxStations is reached.
check the number of shipyards per each race
We can build a shipyard if we have enough money.
We go in the loop even if we don't have enough money, in order to update core security levels.
We don't rebuild shipyards if the player has a fleet in the sector.
